actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Committee on Agriculture received executive comment from Agriculture Department. Adversely.

official_title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to accept under certain conditions during fiscal years 1984, and 1985 offers to exchange needed strategic and critical materials for surplus dairy stocks.

summary.text: Requires the Commodity Credit Corporation to accept under certain conditions during FY 1984 and FY 1985 offers to exchange needed strategic and critical materials for surplus dairy stocks. Requires six-month reports to Congress during such period.

titles.title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to accept under certain conditions during fiscal years 1984, and 1985 offers to exchange needed strategic and critical materials for surplus dairy stocks.
